name: Silent Hill Experience
summary: The Silent Hill Experience combines a variety of media to deliver a complete behind-the-scenes look at the popular Silent Hill franchise. Unique among all PSP products on the market, it uses comics, music and movies; Silent Hill fans will be able to view all-new digital interactive comics, listen to music from the long-running series of Silent Hill video games. Watch exclusive video content, including an interview with the director of the highly-anticipated Silent Hill motion picture.
info:
• 中文名: 寂静岭 历险
  • 开发: KONAMI
  • 别名: The Silent Hill Experience
  • 平台: PSP
  • 游戏类型: UMD VIDEO
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2006/04/06
  • 发行: KONAMI Digital Entertainment GmbH
